Public Class ConcurrentDictionary(Of TKey, TValue) Implements ICollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IDictionary, IDictionary(Of TKey, TValue), IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IReadOnlyCollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IReadOnlyDictionary(Of TKey, TValue)

generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> public ref class ConcurrentDictionary : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<TKey, TValue>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TValue>, System::Collections::IDictionary

span.span: The type of the keys in the dictionary.
The type of the values in the dictionary.

summary.span: 表示可由多个线程同时访问的键/值对的线程安全集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe collection of key/value pairs that can be accessed by multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对于非常大对象，你可以将最大数组大小增加到 2 千兆字节 (GB) 的 64 位系统上的配置元素设置为`true`在运行时环境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum array size to 2 gigabytes (GB) on a 64-bit system by setting the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 实现和开头的接口[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，类未实现这些接口。 implements the and interfaces starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the class did not implement these interfaces. 如类，实现接口。Like the class, implements the interface. 此外，提供用于添加或更新的字典中的键/值对的几个方法下, 表中所述。In addition, provides several methods for adding or updating key/value pairs in the dictionary, as described in the following table. |任务To do this|使用此方法Use this method|用法说明Usage notes| |----------------|---------------------|-----------------| |如果它尚不在字典中存在对该字典中，添加的新键Add a new key to the dictionary, if it doesn’t already exist in the dictionary||如果当前不在字典中存在该键，此方法将添加指定的键/值对。This method adds the specified key/value pair, if the key doesn’t currently exist in the dictionary. 该方法返回`true`或`false`具体取决于是否已添加新对。The method returns `true` or `false` depending on whether the new pair was added.| |如果该注册表项具有特定值，更新为现有键在字典中中的值Update the value for an existing key in the dictionary, if that key has a specific value||此方法检查是否密钥都有一个指定的值，如果它存在，则用新值更新该键。This method checks whether the key has a specified value, and if it does, updates the key with a new value. 它是类似于方法，它的用于字典元素不同。It's similar to the method, except that it's used for dictionary elements.| |无条件地，在字典中存储键/值对，并覆盖已存在的键的值Store a key/value pair in the dictionary unconditionally, and overwrite the value of a key that already exists|索引器的 setter: `dictionary[key] = newValue`The indexer’s setter: `dictionary[key] = newValue`|| |将键/值对添加到字典中，或如果该键已存在，更新基于键的现有值的键的值Add a key/value pair to the dictionary, or if the key already exists, update the value for the key based on the key’s existing value|

- 或 -—or—

| 接受的密钥和两个委托。 accepts the key and two delegates. 它使用第一个委托，如果键不存在字典; 中它接受键，并返回应添加的键的值。It uses the first delegate if the key doesn’t exist in the dictionary; it accepts the key and returns the value that should be added for the key. 它使用第二个委托，如果存在该密钥;它接受密钥和其当前值，并返回新值，应将设置为键。It uses the second delegate if the key does exist; it accepts the key and its current value, and it returns the new value that should be set for the key.

接受键、 值若要添加，以及更新委托。 accepts the key, a value to add, and the update delegate. 这是以前的重载中，相同，只不过它不使用委托来添加的键。This is the same as the previous overload, except that it doesn't use a delegate to add a key.| |获取字典，将值添加到字典并将其返回如果键不存在的键的值Get the value for a key in the dictionary, adding the value to the dictionary and returning it if the key doesn’t exist|

- 或 -—or—

|这些重载提供延迟初始化为键/值对的字典中添加值，仅当不存在。These overloads provide lazy initialization for a key/value pair in the dictionary, adding the value only if it’s not there.

采用键不存在要添加的值。 takes the value to be added if the key doesn’t exist.

将一个委托，如果键不存在，将生成值。 takes a delegate that will generate the value if the key doesn’t exist.| 所有这些操作是原子性的且是线程安全上的所有其他操作方面类。All these operations are atomic and are thread-safe with regards to all other operations on the class. 唯一的例外是，即接受委托，委托的方法和。The only exceptions are the methods that accept a delegate, that is, and . 修改和向字典中，写入操作使用细粒度锁定功能来确保线程安全。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （对字典的读取操作是以无锁方式执行。）但是，若要避免执行在锁下的未知的代码从可能会出现的问题的锁外部调用这些方法的委托。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, delegates for these methods are called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，执行这些委托的代码不进行操作的原子性。Therefore, the code executed by these delegates is not subject to the atomicity of the operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造对象。The following example shows how to construct a object. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/cs/concdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/vb/concdictionary.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 但是，通过的实例之一访问成员实现，包括扩展方法，不能保证是线程安全，可能需要由调用方同步。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例为空，具有默认的并发级别和默认的初始容量，并为键类型使用默认比较器。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default concurrency level, has the default initial capacity, and uses the default comparer for the key type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的并发级别时间的 Cpu 数是默认并发乘数 (DEFAULT_CONCURRENCY_MULTIPLIER)。The default concurrency level is the default concurrency multiplier (DEFAULT_CONCURRENCY_MULTIPLIER) times the number of CPUs. 默认并发乘数越高，更多的并发写入操作会在不干扰和阻止的情况下发生。The higher the default concurrency multiplier is, the more concurrent write operations can take place without interference and blocking. 更高版本的乘数值还会导致需要的所有锁的操作 (例如，表调整大小时，`ToArray`和`Count`) 变得更昂贵。Higher multiplier values also cause operations that require all locks (for example, table resizing, `ToArray` and `Count`) to become more expensive. 默认并发乘数为 4。The default concurrency multiplier is 4. 构造大型字典时，默认容量 (DEFAULT_CAPACITY)，它表示的初始存储桶数，是字典的非常小中的大小和调整数之间进行权衡。The default capacity (DEFAULT_CAPACITY), which represents the initial number of buckets, is a trade-off between the size of a very small dictionary and the number of resizes when constructing a large dictionary. 此外，容量不应被小质数整除。Also, the capacity should not be divisible by a small prime number. 默认的容量为 31。The default capacity is 31.

span.span: This will be either be the result of addValueFactory (if the key was absent) or the result of updateValueFactory (if the key was present).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用同时在不同线程，`addValueFactory`可能被调用多次，但其键/值对可能不会添加到字典中是否每次调用的。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `addValueFactory` may be called multiple times, but its key/value pair might not be added to the dictionary for every call.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字典中返回的枚举器则可以安全地读取一起使用，并将字典，写入，但它不表示字典中的时间在实时快照。The enumerator returned from the dictionary is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the dictionary, however it does not represent a moment-in-time snapshot of the dictionary. 枚举器通过公开的内容可能包含对字典后所做的修改调用。The contents exposed through the enumerator may contain modifications made to the dictionary after was called.

summary.span: 如果该键不存在，则将键/值对添加到 中。

span.span: Adds a key/value pair to the if the key does not already exist.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用方法：The following example shows how to call the method: [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/cs/concdictionary.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/vb/concdictionary.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public TValue GetOrAdd (TKey key, Func<TKey,TValue> valueFactory);
.method public hidebysig instance !TValue GetOrAdd(!TKey key, class System.Func`2<!TKey, !TValue> valueFactory) cil managed
Public Function GetOrAdd (key As TKey, valueFactory As Func(Of TKey, TValue)) As TValue
public: TValue GetOrAdd(TKey key, Func<TKey, TValue> ^ valueFactory);

param.name: key
param.span: 要添加的元素的键。

span.span: The key of the element to add.

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 用于为键生成值的函数。

span.span: The function used to generate a value for the key.

summary.span: 如果该键不存在，则使用指定的函数将键/值对添加到 中；如果该键存在，则返回现有值。

span.span: Adds a key/value pair to the by using the specified function if the key does not already exist, or returns the existing value if the key exists.
The value for the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为可以由其他线程时插入键/值`valueFactory`是生成一个值，您不能信任，只是因为`valueFactory`执行，其生成的值将插入到字典并返回。Since a key/value can be inserted by another thread while `valueFactory` is generating a value, you cannot trust that just because `valueFactory` executed, its produced value will be inserted into the dictionary and returned. 如果调用同时在不同线程，`valueFactory`可能被调用多次，但只有一个键/值对将添加到字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `valueFactory` may be called multiple times, but only one key/value pair will be added to the dictionary. 返回的值取决于在是否由另一个线程后插入键/值和字典中项的存在状态之前调用`valueFactory`生成一个值：The return value depends on the presence of the key in the dictionary and whether a key/value is inserted by another thread after is called but before `valueFactory` generates a value: | 方案Scenario | 返回值Return value | | -------- | ------------ | | 密钥已在字典中。The key is already in the dictionary. | 返回现有值。The existing value is returned. | | 键不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 生成一个值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 上键要重新检查，未找到键。On rechecking for the key, no key is found. | 键/值插入到字典中，而返回的值。The key/value is inserted into the dictionary, and the value is returned. | | 键不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 生成一个值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 虽然`valueFactory`是生成值，另一个线程将插入该密钥的值。While `valueFactory` is generating the value, a different thread inserts a value for the key. 后`valueFactory`执行时是否键要重新检查，找到由另一个线程插入的密钥。After `valueFactory` executes and upon rechecking for the key, the key inserted by the other thread is found. | 返回由另一个线程插入的值。The value inserted by the other thread is returned. |

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 字典中已包含元素的最大数量()。

span.span: The dictionary already contains the maximum number of elements ().

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字典中返回的枚举器则可以安全地读取一起使用，并将字典，写入，但它不表示字典中的时间在实时快照。The enumerator returned from the dictionary is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the dictionary, however it does not represent a moment-in-time snapshot of the dictionary. 枚举器通过公开的内容可能包含对字典后所做的修改调用。The contents exposed through the enumerator may contain modifications made to the dictionary after was called.
